entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud except cloudy along parts of the coast with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Thursday 29 December 2022
